title: PHASE-0: Documentation Indexing & Embeddings
description: Analyze assigned batch, produce findings, store decisions in Redis keys (doc-consolidation:*, doc-update:*, doc-archive:*). Use the batch manifest to claim work.
acceptance_criteria: Redis keys created for all decisions
Uncertain items flagged for Copilot review

title: PHASE-0: Heavy-context Synthesis & Merge Proposals
description: Using full-context capability, review flagged merges and produce merge proposals (include snippets, confidence scores, and merge plan). Persist proposals to Redis and to PHASE-0-AUDIT-FINDINGS.md.
acceptance_criteria: Merge proposals created for all flagged items
Proposals stored in Redis and linked in findings doc

title: PHASE-0: Copilot Orchestration & Remediation Execution
description: Prepare Qdrant collection, run embeddings (or stage scripts), persist overlap matrix, and execute approved merges and archives as non-destructive operations. Build MkDocs audit site.
acceptance_criteria: Qdrant collection staged or embeddings prepared in session-state
MkDocs audit site builds without broken links
